text: "I barley remember this woman because she was very quiet and she seemed to be in awe of Allison. And somewhat under her control, she didn’t speak at all. Visually when I saw a picture of India, it may well be her," Shoaib said, saying of Mack that it "was strange to see her go from a smiling chirpy, extremely friendly girl to someone quite stern."
